main event: A reported sighting of a white, dish-shaped object with a blue-green glow occurred overhead at Chanute Air Force Base on July 1, 1960.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1-2 minutes and the object was visible for about 5 seconds,Two witnesses described it clearly,The object disappeared abruptly from sight,The description of the object was similar to that of a meteor,The observation was made during clear weather conditions.
sighted object: white dish-shaped object with a blue-green glow
witness description: Civilian, Age 35, Secretary to Base WX Officer. Reliability: Very good and a member of the 1953rd AACS.
